Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getFilterStream(FilterQuery)
    use TwitterStream.filter(FilterQuery) instead
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getFirehoseStream(int)
    use TwitterStream.firehose(int) instead
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getLinksStream(int)
    use TwitterStream.links(int) instead
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getRetweetStream()
    use TwitterStream.getRetweetStream() instead
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getSampleStream()
    use TwitterStream.sample() instead
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getUserStream()
    use TwitterStream.user() instead
    twitter4j.TwitterStream.getUserStream(String[])
    use TwitterStream.user() instead
